attributes.action: Remove parliament from the Brexit process by means of a peoples vote.
attributes.additional_details:
It is crystal clear that MP’s are unable to come to an agreement on Brexit. Indicitive votes failed, debates failed and political partnerships have failed

This inept collective have done nothing but run around in circles. They failed most of all US the people of this Great Britian. Playing political ping pong with the nations future. Everyone one of them should match there expenses £1 for £1 and donate to a local foodbank until we leave the EU.
attributes.background:
So it is now the peoples turn again to make the decision that MP’s are unable to do so with a final peoples vote as follows.

1.	Leave the EU on WTO terms.
2.	Leave the EU on the current terms offered by the EU.

The government has 28 days to carry out the result.
